comments.author: fanny
comments.content:
wow great twist as usual Michael. you're always so inspiring.

thank you xxx
Really interesting and I think it would be a lot of fun to serve as a first course.  I love the photo and the plate used..perfect.

comments.author: Tofu Mom
comments.content: These look SO pretty!! And I think they sound great! I've taken a regular old zucchini bread recipe and made really nice, dense (but slightly sweet) "beet bread" that would probably translate well into little red cupcakes. So, what then, is the difference between cupcakes and muffins? :) Just pondering...

comments.author: Greg Turner
comments.content: I wrote a brief essay not long ago bashing cupcakes.  Seeing the way you're thinking about them, I might have to rethink my original assessment.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content:
Tofu Mom - I think the difference is... frosting!

Greg - I just read your cupcake screed. I'll be happy to make you a full beet sheet cake :)!

comments.author: Y
comments.content: They look so pretty. I've been looking for a savoury cupcake recipe and you've definitely given me food for thought here. Thanks! :)

comments.author: ricky
comments.content: intresting twist and will definitely make it. They look so tempting.
